comprehensive_overview: pkgconf is a package configuration system. It helps to provide a uniform and system-agnostic API for the management of build and link flags. It replaces the functionality of pkg-config.
core_features:
1. Management of build and link flags
2. Provides a uniform and system-agnostic API
3. Replaces the functionality of pkg-config
4. Lightweight and efficient
5. Easy to use and integrate into the build process
